p: Results: A total of 233 PICU patients (124 boys and 109 girls) were recorded. There were 53 children with respiratory failure, 39 children with pathology of the nervous system, 31 with sepsis, mainly admitted from the pediatric oncology department, 24 with traumatic brain injuries, and others with miscellaneous reasons for admission. Almost 25Â % of the children with respiratory and neurologic failure suffered from underlying diseases. A total of 1795 units (U) of transfusions were given which were grouped as follow: RPC (385 U), FFP (453 U), PLT (804 U), CP (153 U).
